<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check the current block, as a fast-path, before checking whether</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the use is anywhere in the loop.  Most values are used in the same</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block they are defined in.  Also, blocks not reachable from the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entry are special; uses in them don&#39;t need to go through PHIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UserBB != &amp;BB &amp;&amp; !L.contains(UserBB) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">          DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a1a70f2c359aadd76a72aaaede16aca4a">isReachableFromEntry</a>(UserBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Find the new parent loop for all blocks within the &quot;unloop&quot; whose last</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="comment">/// backedges has just been removed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a03b0cd727b4a519b2d54fbb574093abf">UnloopUpdater</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Map unloop&#39;s immediate subloops to their nearest reachable parents. Nested</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops within these subloops will not change parents. However, an immediate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// subloop&#39;s new parent will be the nearest loop reachable from either its own</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// exits &#42;or&#42; any of its nested loop&#39;s exits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Loop &#42;, Loop &#42;&gt;</a> SubloopParents;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Flag the presence of an irreducible backedge whose destination is a block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// directly contained by the original unloop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Unloop.getNumBlocks()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform a post order CFG traversal of all blocks within this loop,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// propagating the nearest loop from successors to predecessors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((NL != &amp;Unloop &amp;&amp; (!NL || NL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a04337b572d34ea413c35dbac5d75530b">contains</a>(&amp;Unloop))) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is unchanged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((FoundIB || Unloop.contains(L)) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;uninitialized successor&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each irreducible loop within the unloop induces a round of iteration using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Remove unloop&#39;s blocks from all ancestors below their new parents.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a744753a404df90782bb4e68ac6fb293c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a744753a404df90782bb4e68ac6fb293c">UnloopUpdater::removeBlocksFromAncestors</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Unloop.contains(OuterParent)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">        OuterParent = OuterParent-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">      OuterParent = SubloopParents&#91;OuterParent&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">         OldParent = OldParent-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ae34bcd53f75fab0c03b509ecccb4cfaf">getParentLoop</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OldParent &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;new loop is not an ancestor of the original&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Update the parent loop for all subloops directly nested within unloop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return the nearest parent loop among this block&#39;s successors. If a successor</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For subloop blocks, simply update SubloopParents and return NULL.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a764281a8361495e92ef18a100019c9ec"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinfo-cpp-/unloopupdater/#a764281a8361495e92ef18a100019c9ec">UnloopUpdater::getNearestLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;BBLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LoopInfoWrapperPass is a FunctionPass, but verifying every loop in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function each time verifyAnalysis is called is very expensive. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -verify-loop-info option can enable this. In order to perform some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
